name: InstallNetCoreRuntimeAndHosting
description: Azure DevOps pipeline task that installs/updates the .NET Core runtime and hosting bundle.
author: Ronald Bosma

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The action that should be performed:
- Download & Install: will download the installer and than execute it.
- Download: will only download the installer.
- Install: will only execute the installer.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of .NET Core to download and/or install.

inputs.name: norestart
inputs.label: No restart
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the `/norestart` argument will be passed to the installer to suppress any attempts to restart.

inputs.name: useProxy
inputs.label: Use a proxy server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable if a proxy server must be used to download the installer.

inputs.name: proxyServerAddress
inputs.label: Proxy server address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the proxy server. For example: http://proxy.example.com:80.
